did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Housing and Feeding the Homeless Program, 1981-2000
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, publications, newspaper clippings, scrapbooks and related records pertaining to the Housing and Feeding the Homeless Program that existed in the School of Hotel Administration at Cornell.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, publications, newspaper clippings, scrapbooks and related records pertaining to the Housing and Feeding the Homeless Program that existed in the School of Hotel Administration at Cornell.
